title: Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)
description:
Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)

Press 'Add' for the associated editors.

a. Multiple selection could be enabled.

c. The default entry in the associated editors list could be marked as 'default' (similar to perspectives).

NOTES:
KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM)
Also:

f. There is a need for a width hint for the dialog.

g. The File editors Preference page grows in height when selected, unlike other pages.

I currently have fixes for a, c, and f. Need to release.

KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM)
Released fixes for a, c, f, and g.
OB:
The 'Add' button adds a hidden entry.
The associated editors list allows selecting entries that already exist.

The File editors Preference page grows in height when selected, unlike other pages.
EB:
The 'Add' button should not add a hidden entry.
Entries that already exist in the associated editors should not be available for selection.
SR:
To reproduce:

1. Go to the preference page and select 'WorkbenchFile Editors'.
2. Without selecting anything from the 'Internal Editors' section, go to 'External Editors' and select an entry.
3. Switch back to 'Internal Editors' (no selection should still be present). Press OK. This should add the selected external editor to the list.
